00018 template<typename KeyType>
00019 struct KeyTypeConcept
00020 {
00021         void constraints()
00022         {
00023                 KeyType key1;
00024                 KeyType key2;
00025                 key1.compare(key2);
00026         }
00027 };
00028 
00029 struct NullType {
00030         //empty serialize function.
00031         template<class Archive> void serialize(Archive& ar,
00032                         const unsigned int version) {           
00033         }
00034 
00035 };
00036 
00037 //When ValueType is NullType, it is equivatent to unary DataType.
00038 template<typename KeyType, typename ValueType=NullType> class DataType {
00039 public:
00040         DataType() {
00041         }
00042         DataType(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& value) :
00043                 key(key), value(value) {
00044         }
00045 
00046         int compare(const DataType& other) const {
00047                 return _compare(other, static_cast<boost::is_arithmetic<KeyType>*>(0));
00048         }
00049 
00050         template<class Archive> void serialize(Archive& ar,
00051                         const unsigned int version) {
00052                 ar & key;
00053                 ar & value;
00054         }
00055 
00056         const KeyType& get_key() const {
00057                 return key;
00058         }
00059 
00060         const ValueType& get_value() const {
00061                 return value;
00062         }
00063 private:
00064         int _compare(const DataType& other, const boost::mpl::true_*) const {
00065                 return key-other.key;
00066         }
00067 
00068         int _compare(const DataType& other, const boost::mpl::false_*) const {
00069                 BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT((KeyTypeConcept<KeyType>));
00070                 return key.compare(other.key);
00071         }
00072 
00073 public:
00074         KeyType key;
00075         ValueType value;
00076 };
00077 
00078 template<typename KeyType> class DataType<KeyType, NullType> {
00079 
00080 public:
00081         DataType() {
00082         }
00083         DataType(const KeyType& key) :
00084                 key(key) {
00085         }
00086         DataType(const KeyType& key, const NullType&) :
00087                 key(key) {
00088         }
00089 
00090         int compare(const DataType& other) const {
00091                 return _compare(other, static_cast<boost::is_arithmetic<KeyType>*>(0));
00092         }
00093 
00094         template<class Archive> void serialize(Archive& ar,
00095                         const unsigned int version) {
00096                 ar & key;
00097         }
00098 
00099         const KeyType& get_key() const {
00100                 return key;
00101         }
00102         const NullType& get_value() const {
00103                 return value;
00104         }
00105 
00106 private:
00107         int _compare(const DataType& other, const boost::mpl::true_*) const {
00108                 return key-other.key;
00109         }
00110 
00111         int _compare(const DataType& other, const boost::mpl::false_*) const {
00112                 BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT((KeyTypeConcept<KeyType>));
00113                 return key.compare(other.key);
00114         }
00115 
00116 public:
00117         KeyType key;
00118         NullType value;
00119 };
00120 
00121 template<class KeyType> class CompareFunctor :
00122         public binary_function<KeyType, KeyType, int>
00123 
00124 {
00125 public:
00126         int operator()(const KeyType& key1, const KeyType& key2) const {
00127                 return _compare(key1, key2,
00128                                 static_cast<boost::is_arithmetic<KeyType>*>(0));
00129         }
00130 private:
00131         int _compare(const KeyType& key1, const KeyType& key2,
00132                         const boost::mpl::true_*) const {
00133                 return key1 - key2;
00134         }
00135 
00136         int _compare(const KeyType& key1, const KeyType& key2,
00137                         const boost::mpl::false_*) const {
00138                 BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT((KeyTypeConcept<KeyType>));
00139                 return key1.compare(key2);
00140         }
00141 
00142 };
